tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I got my painless root canal treatment done in July this year from Dr.Gagan Khanna, and got two porcelain crowns also installed. The color of the crowns matches the color of my teeth. It feels comfortable in mouth. These crowns comes under 5 year warranty and can last longer with good maintenance, so I am ok with the cost. My 2 canine teeth are not in the right place and the front teeth are slightly crooked. So I will definitely visit again for the treatment (without braces and aligners) to improve my smile and health of my mouth. The doctor is friendly and will give you many solutions to a problem and then you can choose the best option for you.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words and appreciation. Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We went for the first time to meet Dr. Gagan for a dental complication. He was very warmly welcoming, gave us ample time to  make us underatand the problem and various alternative treatments possible, with their respective pros and cons. Apart from 'theory', he has vast experience of 'practical' aspects of how tooth will behave with a given issue over time. Finally he gave a  very simplified solution. I really really liked his down-to-earth and charming demeanor which made us very comfortable to ask any questions. Further, he didn't suggest us any unnecessary & costly treatments and stressed on preserving natural good health of teeth. Surely, he is a highly recommendable dental expert in Delhi. Thanks Dr. Gaganüëçüôè!!!
reply_text: Thank you for kind words and appreciation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Bone Grafting for Dental Implants,Dental Fillings,Dental Crowns,Dental Implant,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
I highly recomend visiting Dr Gagan Khanna at Tooth Essentials clinic. My teeth were in really bad condition and had multiple complications. Dr Khanna was really patient with me and understood my concers and made adjustments accordingly and not compromising on treatment and gave plenty of time towards my treatment. I can't thank Dr Gagan Khanna enough as i can now comfortably eat all kind of food as earlier i was not able to eat even an apple. I am enjoying my new jaw and life feels back to normal. 
Best wishes
Khattar
reply_text: Thank you for your appreciation.
